_header: It is bitter to mans mend
_description: The character of Death — one triplet in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
It is bitter to mannis mendeIt is siker to mannis kendeIt is
                    delere of al oure ende

             The English Religious Lyric in the Middle Ages.

                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 23.
